target: how old are you ? if you do not mind me asking
context: <user> hi there ! how are you ?  <system>  i am okay , feeling pretty anxious . i am pregnant <user> i know what you mean . last month i decided i was done with college .  <system>  how fancy . my husband went to school to be an engineer . <user> now i am sleeping in my mercedes in burbank , until i find a place .  <system>  that is less fancy . is it at least comfortable ? <user> its okay for now . how far along are you ?  <system>  7 months , getting pretty big . lol<user> i am sure you and your husband are thrilled !  <system>  yes of course . i love being pregnant<user> how great ! congratulations . i have always loved romance stories .  <system>  so do i . i also love other things like art for example .<user> me too . i find my self getting emotional over moving art pieces .  <system>
